next_steps: Improve the opportunity quality score by thoroughly reviewing and updating all opportunity details in the CRM, focusing on completeness and accuracy of information regarding customer needs and Schneider Electric's proposed solution.

Increase customer engagement by scheduling a follow-up meeting to address any concerns and proactively provide valuable insights tailored to their specific business challenges, demonstrating a commitment to their success.

Address the negative impact of past sales of Product B by clearly differentiating the current proposed solution and highlighting its unique benefits and value proposition compared to previous offerings, ensuring the customer understands the advancements and improvements.
